svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
July 26, 2020" date: "2020-07-26"
Eth News and Links
Eth1
* Geth v1.9.17 . Whisper is being removed from the Geth codebase
* Latest core devs call . Beiko’s notes
* Backrunning has become an urgent network-clogging problem
* Abstract networking away from Eth client ?
Eth2
* Danny Ryan’s eth2 update - the Medalla multi-client testnet scheduled for Aug 4
* Get a POAP for each of the 5 clients you stake with on the Medalla testnet
* The latest what’s new in eth2
* Attacknets : bounties for taking down the testnet. Right now single-client
attacknets live for Lighthouse, Prysm, and Teku. How Jonny Rhea scored the first take
down
* Latest eth2 call . Ben’s notes
* Eth2 spec v0.12.2 - mostly mild networking changes (will be used in Medalla)
* An Efficient CBC-Like Finality Gadget for 99% Fault Tolerance
* Infura’s eth2 API conformance testing tool
* eth1 and eth2 merger: working simulation of an eth2 client using eth1 client for
block production
Crypto
* Starkware releases EthSTARK hash function with fast prover
* Vitalik’s fully homomorphic encryption explainer
Layer2
* Celer’s Hybrid Rollup is live on Ropsten testnet. DPOS Sidechain with optimistic
rollup opt-in for devs that want more security
* Comparing OMG’s More Viable Plasmachain to a sidechain
This newsletter is made possible thanks to Chainlink !
Building a DeFi application? Secure your project with the most secure and reliable
price data oracle . Chainlink helps leading Defi projects such as Synthetix, Aave, and
many more secure over $1B in value on Ethereum mainnet. See the live aggregations here
Stuff for developers
* Solidity v0.6.12
* NomicLabs/Buildler’s initiative to improve the Eth developer experience , funded by
EF
* Truffle v5.1.36 - debugger stacktraces with contract addresses in the printout
* Using Buidler with Truffle
* WalletConnect v1.1 - i18n support for Spanish, French, German, Portuguese, Korean &
Chinese
* In-depth guide to testing Eth contracts
* Designing unbounded lists in Solidity
* build an ERC721 contract Factory with Webflow and DappHero video tutorial
* Create-eth-app v1.3 - ethers v5, adds Maker, Kyber, Synthetix, Uniswap v2
Ecosystem
* “ Ethereum now settles significantly more value per day than Bitcoin ”
* Vitalik’s Gitcoin grants retrospective
* Blocknative’s analysis of the transaction pool on March 12
Enterprise
* EEA’s mainnet use case analysis survey
* Visa on its blockchain approach - it says they’re network agnostic but most of the
post implies Ethereum
Standards
* EIP2803 : allow transactions from externally owned accounts to execute bytecode
directly
* Micah Zoltu doing lots of EIP cleanup moving into last call, final, withdrawn, etc
Application layer
* yearn yield farming was the talk of the week . Here’s yearn.finance v2
* 1inch passed 1 billion USD in volume and Silicon Valley’s Russ Hanneman made 1inch a
“3 comma club” video
* Dether protocol is on mainnet: peer-to-peer cash-to-crypto on/off ramp
* There is a big fight on Kleros over how an Omen market should resolve
* Before Augur's v2 launch, the updated master plan
* Reality Cards is in private mainnet beta, an NFT-based prediction market with a
gamification twist
Tokens/Business/Regulation
* OCC says US banks can custody crypto
* Only 8 buyers of Spencer Dinwiddie’s tokenized NBA contract for 10% of the total
offered
* What explains the rise of automated market makers (AMMs)
* Sunny Agrawal is bullish on DeFi without the trustlessness
* Tokens before or after product market fit ?
General
* MyCrypto and Binance return 10k to phishing victim
* The long-tail problem in AI and how crypto can solve it
* It’s always the banks: China pressuring banks to reveal pro-Hong Kong democracy
accounts
* More than 1000 people had “God mode” ability to hack Twitter
Job Listings
* Avantgarde Finance ( Melon ): hiring for senior solidity dev & frontend dev
* Reality Cards , a new NFT-based prediction market, is seeking a frontend dev
* 0x is looking for all types of devs: full-stack, back-end, and front-end engineers
* Celer Network: Android developer
* Trail of Bits is looking for: blockchain security engineer & cryptography analyst
* Chainlink has 19+ open roles ! Join as the Head of Product Marketing
Want your job listing here ? $250 per line (~75 character limit including spaces),
payable in ETH/DAI/USDC to evan.ethereum.eth. Questions? thecryptonewspodcast at-gmail
Banned for no reason by Twitter for the 7th time!
Capricious big tech companies continue to make the case for web3: Twitter has
currently suspended both of my legit accounts while scammer impersonators have been
live for years. Regardless of whenever they eventually give me my account back, I’m
re-evaluating to what extent I want to continue to use Twitter.
If you want to post this newsletter on social media for me, here’s the permalink:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-july-26-2020/
In the meantime, join me on Twitch Monday at 1pm Texas time (18:00 GMT) on Twitch to
talk through the last week’s news
Did you get forwarded this newsletter? Sign up to receive it weekly
Dates of Note
Upcoming dates of note ( new/changes in bold ) :
* July 28 - Augur v2 launch
* July 30 - EEA’s Ethereum in the Enterprise 2020 virtual conference
* July 31-Aug 9 - Colorado Lottery & EthDenver Game Jam hackathon
* Aug 2 - ENS grace period begins to end
* Aug 9-11 - EDCON
* Aug 28-29 - Chainlink’s Smart Contract Virtual Summit
* Jul9 - Aug30 - EthPlanet’s Summer Camp virtual event series
* Oct 2-Oct 30 - EthOnline hackathon
* Nov 6-Nov 7 - virtual Trufflecon
Week in Ethereum News
